import React,{useState} from 'react' import './Signup.css' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import {Link,Redirect} from 'react-router-dom' import {login} from '../actions/actions.auth' import {connect} from 'react-redux' export default function Signup({login}) { const {loginData, setLoginData} = useState({ username: '', email: '', password: '' }); const {username,email,password} = loginData; return (

Sign Up

); }
